name: Kensei
text: You study an ancient form of martial training that makes you one with your chosen weapon. Together, you represent a combination of destruction that few foes can long stand against.

features.kenseiControlAction(11thLevel): You can spend an action point to reroll one attack roll, damage roll, skill check, or ability check, instead of taking an extra action
features.kenseiFocus(11thLevel): You gain a +1 bonus to weapon attack rolls with a melee weapon of your choice
features.kenseiMastery(16thLevel): You gain a +4 bonus to damage rolls with the same weapon you selected for Kensei Focus
